page.title: 01HOLY ISLAND
page.content: Sometimes Holy Island is not an Island.It is joined to the Mainland by a causeway.Sometimes people get stuck when the tide is coming in. When the tide is in the causeway is covered with water.When the tide is out seaweed and little rocks are left behind. Cars have to drive very carefully.In the summer thousands of visitors come to the Island.They come across the Pilgrim's Way,which is a diagonal line of wooden poles stretching across the sands.The Pilgrims walk over the sands in bare feet.They have a special service in the Priory.
